title: Record profit: MCB Bank posts earnings of Rs65.3bn in 2023, up over 89% YoY
summary: MCB Bank Limited one of Pakistans largest commercial banks reported its highestever yearly profit driven by an increase in its interestbased income MCB demonstrated exceptional financial performance for the outgoing year said Arif Habib Limited AHL This jump in overall earnings was mainly on the back of growth in total income added the brokerage house This is in addition to an interim dividends already paid at Rs21 per share ie 210 JanJun MCB Banks earnings increase over 150 yearonyear

title: MCB Bank full-year profits soar 89pc, hikes dividend payout
summary: Attock Refinery Limited on Tuesday reported a 104 percent increase in its halfyearly profit after tax boosted by higher sales and other income Attock Petroleum Limited reported a 41 percent jump in halfyearly profit on Tuesday boosted by higher sales and lower operating expenses Pakistan Oilfields Limited POL reported a 234 percent increase in its halfyearly profit after tax boosted by higher revenues and lower exploration costs the company said on Tuesday The companys exploration costs fell by 7931 percent to Rs113 billion as it incurred lower seismic and drilling expenses National Refinery Limited reported a 1515 percent yearonyear decrease in its net loss for the first half of fiscal year 2024 as higher revenues were offset by rising taxes and expenses
